official_title: A bill to require that the United States Postal Service provide mailboxes for certain residential public housing authority buildings.

summary.text: Requires the United States Postal Service to provide a mailbox for each public housing authority building that has 50 or more residential units.

titles.title: A bill to require that the United States Postal Service provide mailboxes for certain residential public housing authority buildings.
